body_html: It's a manual process, usually once a day. Until then, you could sync at the commit that closed this feature (the bug was related to when you run on a machine that doesn't have GPUs, but you compiled with GPU support).
body_text: It's a manual process, usually once a day.  Until then, you could sync at the commit that closed this feature (the bug was related to when you run on a machine that doesn't have GPUs, but you compiled with GPU support).
body: It's a manual process, usually once a day.  Until then, you could sync at the commit that closed this feature (the bug was related to when you run on a machine that doesn't have GPUs, but you compiled with GPU support).
